participant_1.name: Dr. Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, always eager to help others.
participant_1.background: i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. my daughter is a child prodigy.

participant_2.name: Tom Richards
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and nostalgic, with a love for storytelling.
participant_2.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i'm a retired gym teacher. i like watching war documentaries. i was poor growing up.
